age.customDisplay:
{{velocity}} #if ("$!value" == '') #set ($dValue = '-') #else #set ($dValue = '') #if ($value >= 0) #set ($y = $mathtool.idiv($value, 12)) #set ($m = $mathtool.mod($value, 12)) #end #if ($y > 0) #set ($dValue = "${y}y") #end #if ($m > 0) #set ($dValue = "$!dValue ${m}m") #end #end {{html wiki=false clean=false}} #if ($xcontext.action == 'edit')#end
$dValue.trim()
{{/html}} {{/velocity}}
age.name: age

bmi.name: bmi

date_of_birth.customDisplay: {{velocity}}{{html clean=false}} #set ($format = $services.recordConfiguration.activeConfiguration.dateOfBirthFormat) #set ($definedFormat = "$!object.xWikiClass.get($name).getProperty('dateFormat').value") #if ($xcontext.action == 'edit') #set ($date = $xwiki.jodatime.mutableDateTime) #if ("$!xwiki.getUserPreference('timezone')" != '') #set ($discard = $date.setZone($xwiki.jodatime.getTimezone($xwiki.getUserPreference('timezone')))) #end #if (!$value) #set ($value = $date) #else #set ($value = $xwiki.jodatime.getMutableDateTime($value.time)) #if ("$!xwiki.getUserPreference('timezone')" != '') #set ($discard = $value.setZoneRetainFields($xwiki.jodatime.getTimezone($xwiki.getUserPreference('timezone')))) #end #end #if ($format.indexOf('d') < 0) #set ($selMonth = $value.monthOfYear) #set ($selYear= $value.year) #set ($mFormat = $format.replaceAll("[^M]", '')) #set ($yFormat = $format.replaceAll("[^y]", '')) #set ($startYear = $date.year - 99) #set ($endYear = $date.year + 1) #else #end #else #if ($value) #set ($value = $xwiki.jodatime.getMutableDateTime($value.time)) #if ("$!xwiki.getUserPreference('timezone')" != '') #set ($discard = $value.setZoneRetainFields($xwiki.jodatime.getTimezone($xwiki.getUserPreference('timezone')))) #end $!xwiki.formatDate($value.toDate(), $format) #end #end {{/html}}{{/velocity}}
date_of_birth.name: date_of_birth

exam_date.customDisplay: {{velocity}}{{html clean=false}} #set ($format = $services.recordConfiguration.activeConfiguration.dateOfBirthFormat) #set ($definedFormat = "$!object.xWikiClass.get($name).getProperty('dateFormat').value") #if ($xcontext.action == 'edit') #set ($date = $xwiki.jodatime.mutableDateTime) #if ("$!xwiki.getUserPreference('timezone')" != '') #set ($discard = $date.setZone($xwiki.jodatime.getTimezone($xwiki.getUserPreference('timezone')))) #end #if (!$value) #set ($value = $date) #else #set ($value = $xwiki.jodatime.getMutableDateTime($value.time)) #if ("$!xwiki.getUserPreference('timezone')" != '') #set ($discard = $value.setZoneRetainFields($xwiki.jodatime.getTimezone($xwiki.getUserPreference('timezone')))) #end #end #if ($format.indexOf('d') < 0) #set ($selMonth = $value.monthOfYear) #set ($selYear= $value.year) #set ($mFormat = $format.replaceAll("[^M]", '')) #set ($yFormat = $format.replaceAll("[^y]", '')) #set ($startYear = $date.year - 99) #set ($endYear = $date.year + 1) #else #end #else #if ($value) #set ($value = $xwiki.jodatime.getMutableDateTime($value.time)) #if ("$!xwiki.getUserPreference('timezone')" != '') #set ($discard = $value.setZoneRetainFields($xwiki.jodatime.getTimezone($xwiki.getUserPreference('timezone')))) #end $!xwiki.formatDate($value.toDate(), $format) #end #end {{/html}}{{/velocity}}
exam_date.name: exam_date

family_comments.name: family_comments
family_comments.prettyName: List health conditions found in family (describe the relationship with proband)

family_of.customDisplay: {{velocity}} #if ($type == 'edit') {{html clean="false"}}<input class="suggested" id="${doc.fullName}_${prefix}${name}" name="${prefix}${name}" onfocus="new ajaxSuggest(this, {script: '$xwiki.getURL('', 'get', "xpage=suggest&classname=${field.className}&fieldname=${name}&firCol=eid.value&secCol=-")&', varname:'input'} )" type="text" value="$!escapetool.xml($value)" /> {{/html}} #elseif ("$!value" != '') #set ($matchingDocuments = $xwiki.wrapDocs($services.query.xwql("where doc.object(PhenoTips.PatientClass).external_id = :eid").bindValue('eid', $value).execute())) #if ($matchingDocuments.size() == 1) [[${value}>>$matchingDocuments.get(0).documentReference]]## #else $!value## #end #end {{/velocity}}
family_of.name: family_of
family_of.prettyName: This patient is part of the familiy of
family_of.sql: select eid.value from BaseObject as obj, StringProperty as eid where obj.className = 'PhenoTips.PatientClass' and eid.id.id = obj.id and eid.id.name = 'external_id'

maternal_ethnicity.customDisplay:
{{velocity filter="indent"}}{{html wiki=true clean=false}} #if ($object.xWikiClass.get($name).getPropertyClass().isPicker() && ($xcontext.action == 'edit' || $xcontext.action == 'inline')) #set($suggest_script = "${doc.getURL()}?xpage=suggest&classname=${object.xWikiClass.name}&fieldname=${name}&") {{html wiki=false clean=false}}<input name="xwiki-free-multiselect-suggest-script" type="hidden" value="$!escapetool.xml($suggest_script)"/>{{/html}} #end #macro (_fms__displayValue $v $counter) #if($xcontext.action == 'edit' || $xcontext.action == 'inline') {{html wiki=false clean=false}}<input class="xwiki-free-multiselect-value" type="text" size="30" name="${prefix}${name}" id="${prefix}${name}_${counter}" value="$!escapetool.xml($v)"/>{{/html}} #else $escapetool.xml($v) #end#end (% class="xwiki-free-multiselect"%) #foreach ($v in $value) 1. #_fms__displayValue($v ${foreach.count})
#end #if ((!$value || $value.size() == 0) && ($xcontext.action == 'edit' || $xcontext.action == 'inline')) 1. #_fms__displayValue('' 1) #end {{/html}}{{/velocity}}
maternal_ethnicity.name: maternal_ethnicity

negative_phenotype.name: negative_phenotype
negative_phenotype.prettyName: Symptoms NOT observed in this patient
